title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             Social Media and News            Katmai Terrane Blog: What unique stories and events have park staff encountered? Read more in this blog.            News Releases: Subscribe to or browse press releases from Katmai National Park and Preserve.            Newspaper: The latest and greatest edition of Katmai’s newspaper, The Novarupta, is out!           Social Media: Stay connected to Katmai on Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Youtube, and more.
